00015 #include "Board/Rect.h"
00016 
00017 namespace LibBoard {
00018 
00019 Rect
00020 operator||( const Rect & rectA, const Rect & rectB )
00021 {
00022   Rect rect;
00023   rect.top = ( rectA.top > rectB.top ) ? rectA.top : rectB.top;
00024   rect.left = (rectA.left < rectB.left) ? rectA.left : rectB.left;
00025   if ( rectA.left + rectA.width > rectB.left + rectB.width )
00026     rect.width = rectA.left + rectA.width - rect.left;
00027   else
00028     rect.width = rectB.left + rectB.width - rect.left;
00029   if ( rectA.top - rectA.height < rectB.top - rectB.height )
00030     rect.height = rect.top - ( rectA.top - rectA.height );
00031   else
00032     rect.height = rect.top - ( rectB.top - rectB.height );
00033   return rect;
00034 }
00035 
00036 Rect
00037 operator&&( const Rect & rectA, const Rect & rectB )
00038 {
00039   Rect rect;
00040   rect.top = ( rectA.top < rectB.top ) ? rectA.top : rectB.top;
00041   rect.left = (rectA.left > rectB.left) ? rectA.left : rectB.left;
00042   if ( rectA.left + rectA.width < rectB.left + rectB.width )
00043     rect.width = rectA.left + rectA.width - rect.left;
00044   else
00045     rect.width = rectB.left + rectB.width - rect.left;
00046   if ( rectA.top - rectA.height > rectB.top - rectB.height )
00047     rect.height = rect.top - ( rectA.top - rectA.height );
00048   else
00049     rect.height = rect.top - ( rectB.top - rectB.height );
00050   if ( rect.height < 0 ) rect.height = 0;
00051   if ( rect.width < 0 ) rect.width = 0;
00052   return rect;
00053 }
00054 
00055 } // namespace LibBoard
00056 
00057 std::ostream &
00058 operator<<( std::ostream & out, const LibBoard::Rect & rect )
00059 {
00060   out << "Rect(" 
00061       << rect.left << "," << rect.top
00062       << "+" << rect.width << "x" << rect.height << ")";
00063   return out;
00064 }
